Package org.jerkar.api.depmanagement

Contains classes related with repository publication as publishing on a Maven or Ivy repository.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
JkDependencyNode.NodeInfo  
JkPublishFilter Defines filter to accept or not module to be published on a given JkPublishRepo
 

Class Summary
JkComputedDependency Dependency on computed resource.
JkDependencies A set of JkScopedDependency generally standing for the entire dependencies of a project/module.
JkDependencies.Builder Builder for JkDependencies
JkDependencies.Builder.JkFluentAfterMapScopeBuilder Type returned after the left part of the scope mapping has been declared.
JkDependencies.Builder.JkFluentAfterToBuilder Type returned after the right side declaration of a scope mapping.
JkDependencies.Builder.JkFluentModuleDepBuilder Returned type after an addition of a JkModuleDependency.
JkDependencies.Builder.JkFluentScopeableBuilder Returned type after an addition of a JkDependency.
JkDependency Identifier for a dependency of a project.
JkDependency.JkFileDependency Dependencies that can directly provide files without passing by an external medium.
JkDependencyExclusions Holds information about transitive dependencies to exclude.
JkDependencyExclusions.Builder A builder for JkDependencyExclusions.
JkDependencyNode A representation of a node in a dependency tree.
JkDependencyNode.FileNodeInfo  
JkDependencyNode.ModuleNodeInfo  
JkDependencyResolver A resolver for a given set of dependency.
JkDepExclude Information about excluding artifacts or whole modules.
JkFileSystemDependency A dependency on files located on file system.
JkIvyPublication Informations required to publish a module in an Ivy repository.
JkMavenPublication Publication specific information to include in POM file in order to be published in a Maven repository.
JkMavenPublication.JkClassifiedArtifact An artifact with a classifier for Maven repository.
JkMavenPublicationInfo These are extra information required to publish on Maven central.
JkMavenPublicationInfo.JkDeveloperInfo Information about a developer.
JkMavenPublicationInfo.JkLicenseInfo Information about a license.
JkMavenPublicationInfo.JkProjectInfo Information about a project.
JkMavenPublicationInfo.JkScmInfo Information about source control system managing the project sources.
JkModuleDependency A dependency on an external module.
JkModuleDepProblem Information about problem when resolving dependencies
JkModuleId Identifier for project.
JkPopularModules  
JkPublisher A class to publish artifacts on repositories.
JkPublishRepo Stands for a repository for deploying artifacts.
JkPublishRepos Set of repositories to publish to.
JkRepo An abstract repository that can be either a Maven nor an Ivy repository.
JkRepo.JkIvyRepository An Ivy repository.
JkRepo.JkMavenRepository A Maven repository.
JkRepos A set of JkRepo
JkResolutionParameters CInstances of this class are used to parameter the dependency resolution
JkResolveResult Result of a module dependency resolution for a given scope.
JkResolveResult.JkErrorReport  
JkScope Defines a context where is defined dependencies of a given project.
JkScope.JkScopeBuilder A JkScope allowing to define other scope from it.
JkScopedDependency A dependency along a scope information to specify for wich purpose it should be used.
JkScopeMapping A mapping to scopes to scopes acting when declaring dependencies.
JkScopeMapping.Partial Partial object to construct a scope mapping.
JkVersion Used to specify a module version.
JkVersionedModule Identifies a given module in a given version
JkVersionProvider Association between moduleIds and version.
JkVersionRange Expresses a version constraints for a given external modules.
 

Enum Summary
JkScopedDependency.ScopeType Type for the scope.
 

Package org.jerkar.api.depmanagement Description

Contains classes related with repository publication as publishing on a Maven or Ivy repository.
